by caoua cofee tail of cat see instruction p otos below cut 4 pieces of cc yarn eac about 20cm/8inc es long and fold t em in alf to form a loop stick a croc et ook t roug t e fabric at t e place indicated by a circle in t e cat c art t ereby going under 2 bars of yarn place t e loop of t e yarn pieces on t e croc et ook and pull ~1 5cm/0 5 increase es t roug stick t e ends of t e yarns t roug t e loop and pull tig t divide t e yarn ends into 4 groups of 2 and make a braid like t is step 1 cross rightmost strand over one strand towards t e center step 2 cross leftmost strand over two strands towards t e center repeat t ese two moves rig t strand over one left strand over two until t e braid reac es 1 increase in lengt tie a knot to end t e braid and trim to an even end finishing weave in all ends use one end near t e ears to tuck down t e one long foat t ere knit a second sock and enjoy about this pattern papageno is t e birdcatc er in t e magic flute opera by wolfgang a mozart e as a playful somew at stubborn c ildlike c aracter t at gives a lively touc to t is eternal story of good and evil t ere s no difculty fnding t e birdcatc er in t ese c eerful c ildren s socks i saw t e pattern motif on a commercial sweater and adapted it for t e smaller frame of t ese socks ____ ©caoua cofff 2018 this pattfrn is for non-commfrcial pfrsonal usf only all rights rfsfrvfd thfrf s onf fxcfption you arf fxplicitly fncouragfd to makf or sfll itfms madf from this pattfrn for charity purposfs if you havf frror rfports or any suggfstions concfrning this pattfrn you can contact mf on ravflry as caouacofff ©caoua cofff 2018 pattfrn is for non-commfrcial pfrsonal usf only
